while everybody else is getting out of bed

flat like an idol singer

but im afraid when i hear stories

that flock together
see train liveget tickets as low as 24you might also likepostchorus

got to have something to keep us together
love love
thats enough for me

took a loan on a house i own

except cologne cause its poison

where the rain falls mainly on the plain
sounds insane cause it is we can laugh we can sing
have ten kids and give them everything

i love you from your toes to your face
